title: Roborock robot vacuum & mop combos get hefty Prime Big Deal Days discounts up to 63% off
description: Take advantage of Amazon Prime Big Deal Days and get a Roborock robot vacuum and mop that will help clean your home and free up time for the family.Save up to 63% on Roborock robot vacuums (Source: Roborock)Don't miss out on the short-lived deals brought about by Amazon Prime Big Deal Days now through October 13. Roborock is offering significant discounts up to 63% off its most popular robot vacuum and mop combos.After 10 years on the market, Roborock knows what families need to keep their home clean with little hassle. Let the robots do the hard work while you focus on what's important — getting time back with your family. Continue Reading on AppleInsider
author: Sponsored Content
excerpt: Take advantage of Amazon Prime Big Deal Days and get a Roborock robot vacuum and mop that will help clean your home and free up time for the family.
text: Take advantage of Amazon Prime Big Deal Days and get a Roborock robot vacuum and mop that will help clean your home and free up time for the family. Don't miss out on the short-lived deals brought about by Amazon Prime Big Deal Days now through October 13. Roborock is offering significant discounts up to 63% off its most popular robot vacuum and mop combos. After 10 years on the market, Roborock knows what families need to keep their home clean with little hassle. Let the robots do the hard work while you focus on what's important — getting time back with your family. As the holiday season approaches, get a new Roborock robot vacuum and mop to get the most out of your upcoming time off. There is a large variety of options across price points, so choose the one that works best for your needs and budget. Roborock Qrevo Master The Roborock Qrevo Master takes the guesswork out of cleaning with a robot vacuum and mop. It handles everything with its Flexi Arm side brush for 100% edge coverage while vacuuming and the Flexi Arm Design Mop reaches 98.8% of surfaces. Roborock Qrevo Master and the multifunction dock The vacuum operates with a powerful suction at 10,000Pa HyperForce and features anti-tangle technology. The dual spinning mops spin at 200 RPM with 30 levels of water flow. The Multifunctional Dock 3.0 washes the mops with hot water that kills 99.7% of bacteria. If water collected from the basin is still too dirty when it is passed to the dirty water tank, it will re-wash the mop pads before resuming cleaning and the robot will re-clean the area that produced such dirty water. When the Roborock Qrevo Master returns to the dock, the mop pads are dried with 113 degree Fahrenheit warm air, and dust emptied from the vacuum into the dock only needs cleaned out once every seven weeks. Roborock Qrevo Master avoids obstacles while cleaning Roborock Qrevo Master will intelligently navigate your home with Reactive Al Obstacle Recognition. Plus, it will lift the brush and mops as needed for different cleaning modes or surfaces, like cleaning hardwood floors versus carpet. Customize how you interact with Roborock Qrevo Master in the Roborock app, which includes a remote-control mode, video calling feature, and pet-care options. If your hands are full, the "Hello Rocky" voice command works too. Get the Roborock Qrevo Master at a 41% discount during Prime Big Deal Days. It is priced at $949.99 on Amazon, down from $1,599.99. Roborock Qrevo S The Roborock Qrevo S has a 7,000Pa HyperForce vacuum and 200RPM liftable dual spinning mops. The middle-tier robot vacuum and mop can still clean the floor as if you took the time to mop yourself. Roborock Qrevo S offers intelligent features at a more affordable price PreciSense LiDAR navigation lets it intelligently learn routes and update maps when obstacles are encountered thanks to Reactive Al Obstacle Recognition. Roborock Qrevo S cleans your home, self-washes the mops with water from the water tank, auto-empties the dust, and dries the mop pads with warm air. As the robot cleans, it can adjust based on if it is cleaning hardwood floors or carpet, and it can lift the mops as well. It will even intelligently clean bedrooms before bathrooms. This middle-tier robot vacuum and mop offers several of the same specs as more powerful models, but at a much more affordable price. The multifunction dock has a water tank and dust bin that minimizes maintenance. Roborock Q5 Max+ If you're looking for an even more budget-friendly option, then the Roborock Q5 Max+ is a robot vacuum cleaner option that won't break the bank. It has a docking station for charging and will self-empty the vacuum for 7 weeks before needing a human to empty the bin. Roborock Q5 Max+ can vacuum and self-empty for up to 7 weeks The dual roller design reduces pet hair tangles, while the 5,500Pa suction power is strong enough to tackle big messes. The 770ml onboard dustbin provides plenty of space to keep cleaning for the full 240 minutes of available runtime. If you've already got a robot vacuum and mop for one level of your home, but need something simple for your carpeted second floor, a budget-friendly robot vacuum cleaner may be the perfect choice. Even if this is your first home cleaning robot, it'll get the job done. Get the Roborock Q5 Max+ at a 50% discount during Prime Big Deal Days. That's $299.99 on Amazon. Roborock Qrevo Curv The Qrevo Curv steps up the game with an 18,500Pa HyperForce suction, Dual Anti-Tangle System, and Flexi Arm Arc Side Brush. The dual spinning 200RPM mops also have Flexi Arm technology for hard-to-reach spots and corners. Roborock Qrevo Curv can get over steep ledges without assistance The main DuoDivide Brush prevents tangles and clogging with two parallel spiral blades that guide hair toward the center. Both the main brush and side brush have anti-tangle systems. What separates the Roborock Qrevo Curv is the AdaptiLift Chassis that can lift the entire robot 10mm. Tall thresholds and carpets won't be an issue with up to 4cm threshold crossing. The Multifunctional Dock 3.0 has the same features as the one mentioned before, but with upgraded specs. The hot water mop washing cleans the mop pads with 167 degree Fahrenheit water heated from the water tank. Roborock Qrevo Curv also has the intelligent dirt detection used for re-wash and re-mop actions. Warm air dries the mop pads at 113 degrees Fahrenheit, and dust is emptied without the need for human intervention for 7 weeks. Roborock Qrevo Curv has a sleek multifunction dock that minimizes needed maintenance In addition to voice control, Reactive Al Obstacle Recognition, and pet recognition, the robot vacuum and mop has PreciSense LiDAR Navigation. Automatically generate maps in real time with smart suggestions for no-go zones. Ask the Roborock Qrevo Curv to visit with pets, view them through the camera, and speak through the microphone when away from home. It can also perform specific temporary cleaning tasks without affecting other areas unnecessarily. Roborock Qrevo Curv is also Matter certified. That means Matter-compatible smart home systems can communicate with the Curv to give simple commands. Get the Roborock Qrevo Curv from Amazon for $1,299.99. That's a 19% discount from $1,599.99. Roborock Q7 Max+ The Roborock Q7 Max+ includes the robot vacuum and mop with auto-empty dock at an incredible discount. If you're looking for an all-in-one cleaning solution at the absolute lowest price, this is it. Roborock Q7 Max+ is a great budget option to keep your home clean from loose pet fur Clean your floors with 4,200 Pa suction and mop simultaneously with 11 oz of constant mopping pressure. The robot can run for up to 3 hours on a single charge, which is enough to tackle a single pass of most homes. Roborock Q7 Max+ uses PreciSense LiDAR to navigate and map the home. Users can view the 3D map in the Roborock app. Set up voice assistant controls for your preferred option, either Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa. Or simply schedule cleanings in the Roborock app. More Roborock robot vacuum and mop deals Those models aren't the only Roborock robot vacuum and mop combos for sale during Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. Check out these discounted models, which include docks with a dust bin and water tank. Roborock Qrevo Plus: 33% off from Amazon for $579.99 Roborock S8 Max Ultra: 31% off from Amazon for $1,099.99 Roborock Q7 Max: 63% off from Amazon for $219.99 Roborock Q5 Pro: 58% off from Amazon for $179.99 Roborock Q8 Max: 53% off from Amazon for $279.99
html:
Take advantage of Amazon Prime Big Deal Days and get a Roborock robot vacuum and mop that will help clean your home and free up time for the family.

Don't miss out on the short-lived deals brought about by Amazon Prime Big Deal Days now through October 13. Roborock is offering significant discounts up to 63% off its most popular robot vacuum and mop combos.

After 10 years on the market, Roborock knows what families need to keep their home clean with little hassle. Let the robots do the hard work while you focus on what's important — getting time back with your family.

As the holiday season approaches, get a new Roborock robot vacuum and mop to get the most out of your upcoming time off. There is a large variety of options across price points, so choose the one that works best for your needs and budget.

Roborock Qrevo Master

The Roborock Qrevo Master takes the guesswork out of cleaning with a robot vacuum and mop. It handles everything with its Flexi Arm side brush for 100% edge coverage while vacuuming and the Flexi Arm Design Mop reaches 98.8% of surfaces.

Roborock Qrevo Master and the multifunction dock

The vacuum operates with a powerful suction at 10,000Pa HyperForce and features anti-tangle technology. The dual spinning mops spin at 200 RPM with 30 levels of water flow.

The Multifunctional Dock 3.0 washes the mops with hot water that kills 99.7% of bacteria. If water collected from the basin is still too dirty when it is passed to the dirty water tank, it will re-wash the mop pads before resuming cleaning and the robot will re-clean the area that produced such dirty water.

When the Roborock Qrevo Master returns to the dock, the mop pads are dried with 113 degree Fahrenheit warm air, and dust emptied from the vacuum into the dock only needs cleaned out once every seven weeks.

Roborock Qrevo Master avoids obstacles while cleaning

Roborock Qrevo Master will intelligently navigate your home with Reactive Al Obstacle Recognition. Plus, it will lift the brush and mops as needed for different cleaning modes or surfaces, like cleaning hardwood floors versus carpet.

Customize how you interact with Roborock Qrevo Master in the Roborock app, which includes a remote-control mode, video calling feature, and pet-care options. If your hands are full, the "Hello Rocky" voice command works too.

Get the Roborock Qrevo Master at a 41% discount during Prime Big Deal Days. It is priced at $949.99 on Amazon, down from $1,599.99.

Roborock Qrevo S

The Roborock Qrevo S has a 7,000Pa HyperForce vacuum and 200RPM liftable dual spinning mops. The middle-tier robot vacuum and mop can still clean the floor as if you took the time to mop yourself.

Roborock Qrevo S offers intelligent features at a more affordable price

PreciSense LiDAR navigation lets it intelligently learn routes and update maps when obstacles are encountered thanks to Reactive Al Obstacle Recognition. Roborock Qrevo S cleans your home, self-washes the mops with water from the water tank, auto-empties the dust, and dries the mop pads with warm air.

As the robot cleans, it can adjust based on if it is cleaning hardwood floors or carpet, and it can lift the mops as well. It will even intelligently clean bedrooms before bathrooms.

This middle-tier robot vacuum and mop offers several of the same specs as more powerful models, but at a much more affordable price. The multifunction dock has a water tank and dust bin that minimizes maintenance.

Roborock Q5 Max+

If you're looking for an even more budget-friendly option, then the Roborock Q5 Max+ is a robot vacuum cleaner option that won't break the bank. It has a docking station for charging and will self-empty the vacuum for 7 weeks before needing a human to empty the bin.

Roborock Q5 Max+ can vacuum and self-empty for up to 7 weeks

The dual roller design reduces pet hair tangles, while the 5,500Pa suction power is strong enough to tackle big messes. The 770ml onboard dustbin provides plenty of space to keep cleaning for the full 240 minutes of available runtime.

If you've already got a robot vacuum and mop for one level of your home, but need something simple for your carpeted second floor, a budget-friendly robot vacuum cleaner may be the perfect choice. Even if this is your first home cleaning robot, it'll get the job done.

Get the Roborock Q5 Max+ at a 50% discount during Prime Big Deal Days. That's $299.99 on Amazon.

Roborock Qrevo Curv

The Qrevo Curv steps up the game with an 18,500Pa HyperForce suction, Dual Anti-Tangle System, and Flexi Arm Arc Side Brush. The dual spinning 200RPM mops also have Flexi Arm technology for hard-to-reach spots and corners.

Roborock Qrevo Curv can get over steep ledges without assistance

The main DuoDivide Brush prevents tangles and clogging with two parallel spiral blades that guide hair toward the center. Both the main brush and side brush have anti-tangle systems.

What separates the Roborock Qrevo Curv is the AdaptiLift Chassis that can lift the entire robot 10mm. Tall thresholds and carpets won't be an issue with up to 4cm threshold crossing.

The Multifunctional Dock 3.0 has the same features as the one mentioned before, but with upgraded specs. The hot water mop washing cleans the mop pads with 167 degree Fahrenheit water heated from the water tank.

Roborock Qrevo Curv also has the intelligent dirt detection used for re-wash and re-mop actions. Warm air dries the mop pads at 113 degrees Fahrenheit, and dust is emptied without the need for human intervention for 7 weeks.

Roborock Qrevo Curv has a sleek multifunction dock that minimizes needed maintenance

In addition to voice control, Reactive Al Obstacle Recognition, and pet recognition, the robot vacuum and mop has PreciSense LiDAR Navigation. Automatically generate maps in real time with smart suggestions for no-go zones.

Ask the Roborock Qrevo Curv to visit with pets, view them through the camera, and speak through the microphone when away from home. It can also perform specific temporary cleaning tasks without affecting other areas unnecessarily.

Roborock Qrevo Curv is also Matter certified. That means Matter-compatible smart home systems can communicate with the Curv to give simple commands.

Get the Roborock Qrevo Curv from Amazon for $1,299.99. That's a 19% discount from $1,599.99.

Roborock Q7 Max+

The Roborock Q7 Max+ includes the robot vacuum and mop with auto-empty dock at an incredible discount. If you're looking for an all-in-one cleaning solution at the absolute lowest price, this is it.

Roborock Q7 Max+ is a great budget option to keep your home clean from loose pet fur

Clean your floors with 4,200 Pa suction and mop simultaneously with 11 oz of constant mopping pressure. The robot can run for up to 3 hours on a single charge, which is enough to tackle a single pass of most homes.

Roborock Q7 Max+ uses PreciSense LiDAR to navigate and map the home. Users can view the 3D map in the Roborock app.

Set up voice assistant controls for your preferred option, either Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa. Or simply schedule cleanings in the Roborock app.

More Roborock robot vacuum and mop deals

Those models aren't the only Roborock robot vacuum and mop combos for sale during Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. Check out these discounted models, which include docks with a dust bin and water tank.

  • Roborock Qrevo Plus: 33% off from Amazon for $579.99
  • Roborock S8 Max Ultra: 31% off from Amazon for $1,099.99
  • Roborock Q7 Max: 63% off from Amazon for $219.99
  • Roborock Q5 Pro: 58% off from Amazon for $179.99
  • Roborock Q8 Max: 53% off from Amazon for $279.99
